title: How Do You Know if a Canning Recipe is Safe
itunes:title: How Do You Know if a Canning Recipe is Safe
description: How do you now if a canning recipe is safe and what do you do when someone isn't following canning safety? How can you make sure your canning recipe is up to date? Learn what you need to know about canning safety and recipes and how to handle those who aren't practicing up to date safe practices. Get the full blog post and resource links at https://melissaknorris.com/153
